dcterms:description: Sentinel-1 is an Earth observation mission that provides high-resolution radar imagery, useful for monitoring land and vegetation changes.

dcterms:description: Sentinel-2 is an Earth observation mission that provides high-resolution optical imagery, useful for assessing vegetation health and land cover.

dcterms:description: ALOS-2 PALSAR-2 is a Japanese spaceborne SAR system that operates at L-band frequencies, providing valuable insights into forest structure and height.

dcterms:creator: NASA, J.
dcterms:description: NASA's High-Resolution Digital Elevation Model (NASADEM) provides improved digital elevation data for global terrain representation.
